thread.title: HelloTel App Tops $2 Million in Funding as Mobile App Receives Updated Look
thread.title_full: HelloTel App Tops $2 Million in Funding as Mobile App Receives Updated Look - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: HelloTel App Tops $2 Million in Funding as Mobile App Receives Updated Look
text:
HelloTel App
Travel app also aligns new look with Apple Watch version
CHICO, Calif. , Aug. 26, Just weeks after HelloTel App was approved for the Apple Watch, the fast-growing travel app updated its mobile versions. The all-new design features parallax scrolling, bold and beautiful colors, and lightning-fast search results for an improved overall experience. Users can download the app here on any device:
Download HelloTel App
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150826/261285
"As one of the few travel apps to successfully move to the Apple Watch, the mobile versions of HelloTel App were ready for a matching look," said HelloTel App founder Marc Lewis . "The new features put us right up there with some of the best-looking apps. The result is a stunning new look, and the same amazing app."
Images of the new look can be found in a Facebook album here .
The update (for Android and iOS users) also still allows users to filter and find others by hotel and nearby, as well as whether travelers have signed in for social or business purposes. Users can also post photos, comment on other users' posts, and send and receive private messages.
Additionally, HelloTel App announced that after its most recent round of funding, more than $2 million has been raised since June 2014 . Downloads for HelloTel App on the Apple Watch remain consistent with numbers of other popular apps.
HelloTel App continues to gain new international travelers since announcing its release in Australia , Brazil , Canada and the United Kingdom .
About HelloTel App
Launched in October 2014 , HelloTel App is a mobile application available on iOS and Android. HelloTel App connects hotel guests together like never before by allowing them to post comments and photos and direct message each other. For more information, visit http://www.hellotelapp.com , like us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/hellotelapp or follow us on Twitter and Instagram at http://www.twitter.com/hellotelapp and http://www.instagram.com/HelloTelApp
